title: cmd/godoc: regression with package runtime
body:
"godoc runtime" stopped working recently, yielding this error at tip:
  2013/01/24 10:24:38 /target contains more than one package: runtime, main

I imagine that's because there's a bunch of standalone programs now in
$GOROOT/src/pkg/runtime. I would have expected godoc to ignore those
for this purpose.
